## Description {#details}

This file is a part of <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-dataflowsanitizer-cpp-/dataflowsanitizer">DataFlowSanitizer</a>, a generalised dynamic data flow analysis.

Unlike other Sanitizer tools, this tool is not designed to detect a specific class of bugs on its own. Instead, it provides a generic dynamic data flow analysis framework to be used by clients to help detect application-specific issues within their own code.

The analysis is based on automatic propagation of data flow labels (also known as taint labels) through a program as it performs computation.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/argument">Argument</a> and return value labels are passed through TLS variables &#95;&#95;dfsan&#95;arg&#95;tls and &#95;&#95;dfsan&#95;retval&#95;tls.

Each byte of application memory is backed by a shadow memory byte. The shadow byte can represent up to 8 labels. On Linux/x86&#95;64, memory is then laid out as follows:

+-----------------—+ 0x800000000000 (top of memory) | application 3 | +-----------------—+ 0x700000000000 | invalid | +-----------------—+ 0x610000000000 | origin 1 | +-----------------—+ 0x600000000000 | application 2 | +-----------------—+ 0x510000000000 | shadow 1 | +-----------------—+ 0x500000000000 | invalid | +-----------------—+ 0x400000000000 | origin 3 | +-----------------—+ 0x300000000000 | shadow 3 | +-----------------—+ 0x200000000000 | origin 2 | +-----------------—+ 0x110000000000 | invalid | +-----------------—+ 0x100000000000 | shadow 2 | +-----------------—+ 0x010000000000 | application 1 | +-----------------—+ 0x000000000000

MEM&#95;TO&#95;SHADOW(mem) = mem ^ 0x500000000000 SHADOW&#95;TO&#95;ORIGIN(shadow) = shadow + 0x100000000000

For more information, please refer to the design document: <a href="http://clang.llvm.org/docs/DataFlowSanitizerDesign.html">http://clang.llvm.org/docs/DataFlowSanitizerDesign.html</a>

<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This file is a part of DataFlowSanitizer, a generalised dynamic data flow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// analysis.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Unlike other Sanitizer tools, this tool is not designed to detect a specific</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// class of bugs on its own.  Instead, it provides a generic dynamic data flow</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">/// analysis framework to be used by clients to help detect application-specific</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// issues within their own code.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The analysis is based on automatic propagation of data flow labels (also</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// known as taint labels) through a program as it performs computation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Argument and return value labels are passed through TLS variables</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#95;&#95;dfsan&#95;arg&#95;tls and &#95;&#95;dfsan&#95;retval&#95;tls.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Each byte of application memory is backed by a shadow memory byte. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// shadow byte can represent up to 8 labels. On Linux/x86&#95;64, memory is then</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// laid out as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 140737488355328 (top of memory)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |    application 3   |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 123145302310912</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      invalid       |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 106652627894272</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      origin 1      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 105553116266496</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |    application 2   |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 89060441849856</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      shadow 1      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 87960930222080</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      invalid       |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 70368744177664</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      origin 3      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 52776558133248</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 35184372088832</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      origin 2      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 18691697672192</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      invalid       |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 17592186044416</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |      shadow 2      |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 1099511627776</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// |    application 1   |</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">/// +--------------------+ 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">/// MEM&#95;TO&#95;SHADOW(mem) = mem ^ 87960930222080</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SHADOW&#95;TO&#95;ORIGIN(shadow) = shadow + 17592186044416</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For more information, please refer to the design document:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The -dfsan-preserve-alignment flag controls whether this pass assumes that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// alignment requirements provided by the input IR are correct.  For example,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if the input IR contains a load with alignment 8, this flag will cause</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the shadow load to have alignment 16  This flag is disabled by default as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we have unfortunately encountered too much code (including Clang itself;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// see PR14291) which performs misaligned access.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="#a5f58d18a4fdfd2fda2d3f931f869e2a1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="#a5f58d18a4fdfd2fda2d3f931f869e2a1">ClPreserveAlignment</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;dfsan-preserve-alignment&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The ABI list files control how shadow parameters are passed. The pass treats</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// every function labelled &quot;uninstrumented&quot; in the ABI list file as conforming</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the &quot;native&quot; (i.e. unsanitized) ABI.  Unless the ABI list contains</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// additional annotations for those functions, a call to one of those functions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will produce a warning message, as the labelling behaviour of the function is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unknown. The other supported annotations for uninstrumented functions are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;functional&quot; and &quot;discard&quot;, which are described below under</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DataFlowSanitizer::WrapperKind.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Functions will often be labelled with both &quot;uninstrumented&quot; and one of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;functional&quot; or &quot;discard&quot;. This will leave the function unchanged by this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pass, and create a wrapper function that will call the original.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Instrumented functions can also be annotated as &quot;force&#95;zero&#95;labels&quot;, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will make all shadow and return values set zero labels.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Functions should never be labelled with both &quot;force&#95;zero&#95;labels&quot; and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;uninstrumented&quot; or any of the unistrumented wrapper kinds.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Controls whether the pass includes or ignores the labels of pointers in load</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Transforming a function may change the position of arguments.  This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// member records the mapping from each argument&#39;s old position to its new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// position.  Argument positions are zero-indexed.  If the transformation</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// from F to F&#39; made the first argument of F into the third argument of F&#39;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// then ArgumentIndexMapping&#91;0&#93; will equal 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dataflowsanitizer-cpp-/transformedfunction/#a7ee9b90c50e4cab5497133418264f68c"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dataflowsanitizer-cpp-/transformedfunction/#a7ee9b90c50e4cab5497133418264f68c">ArgumentIndexMapping</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// How should calls to uninstrumented functions be handled?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// This function is present in an uninstrumented form but we don&#39;t know</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// how it should be handled.  Print a warning and call the function anyway.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Don&#39;t label the return value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">    WK&#95;Warning,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// This function does not write to (user-accessible) memory, and its return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// value is unlabelled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">    WK&#95;Discard,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// This function does not write to (user-accessible) memory, and the label</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// of its return value is the union of the label of its arguments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">    WK&#95;Functional,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Applies PrimitiveShadow to all primitive subtypes of T, returning</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// EFP(&#123;T1,T2, ...&#125;, PS) = &#123;EFP(T1,PS),EFP(T2,PS),...&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extern weak functions can sometimes be null at execution time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Code will sometimes check if an extern weak function is null.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This could look something like:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   declare extern&#95;weak i8 @my&#95;func(i8)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   br i1 icmp ne (i8 (i8)&#42; @my&#95;func, i8 (i8)&#42; null), label %use&#95;my&#95;func,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   label %avoid&#95;my&#95;func</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The @&quot;dfsw$my&#95;func&quot; wrapper is never null, so if we replace this use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the comparison, the icmp will simplify to false and we have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// accidentally optimized away a null check that is necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This can lead to a crash when the null extern&#95;weak my&#95;func is called.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To prevent (the most common pattern of) this problem,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// do not replace uses in comparisons with the wrapper.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We definitely want to replace uses in call instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Other uses (e.g. store the function address somewhere) might be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// called or compared or both - this case may not be handled correctly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We will default to replacing with wrapper in cases we are unsure.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsNotCmpUse = &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &amp;U) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;Usr = U.getUser();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the most common case for icmp ne null</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compute the integer shadow offset that corresponds to a given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><Highlight kind="comment">/// application address.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Offset = (Addr &amp; ~AndMask) ^ XorMask</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;DataFlowSanitizer::getShadowOffset(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Addr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;IRB) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OffsetLong = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a3ef26a11123d639b64307cc3c1b869b9">CreatePointerCast</a>(Addr, IntptrTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2147"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;Value &#42;, Value &#42;&gt; DFSanFunction::loadShadowFast(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2149"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> OriginAlign, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;FirstOrigin, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> Pos) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShouldTrackOrigins = DFS.shouldTrackOrigins();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t ShadowSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &#42; DFS.ShadowWidthBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2153"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt;= 4 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Not large enough load size for fast path!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Used for origin tracking.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;Value &#42;&gt; Shadows;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2157"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;Value &#42;&gt; Origins;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Load instructions in LLVM can have arbitrary byte sizes (e.g., 3, 12, 20)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// but this function is only used in a subset of cases that make it possible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to optimize the instrumentation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Specifically, when the shadow size in bytes (i.e., loaded bytes x shadow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// per byte) is either:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - a multiple of 8  (common)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - equal to 4       (only for load32)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the second case, we can fit the wide shadow in a 32-bit integer. In all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other cases, we use a 64-bit integer to hold the wide shadow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;WideShadowTy =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShadowSize == 4 ? <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a30dd396c5b40cd86c1591872e574ccdf">Type::getInt32Ty</a>(&#42;DFS.Ctx) : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a>::getInt64Ty(&#42;DFS.Ctx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> IRB(Pos-&gt;getParent(), Pos);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;CombinedWideShadow =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><Highlight kind="normal">      IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a3313ae2d314fb689cebdaf062d86eec5">CreateAlignedLoad</a>(WideShadowTy, ShadowAddr, ShadowAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2176"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2177"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WideShadowBitWidth = WideShadowTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a13e877ef779ba7a0688081079f4f9b03">getIntegerBitWidth</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t BytesPerWideShadow = WideShadowBitWidth / DFS.ShadowWidthBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AppendWideShadowAndOrigin = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WideShadow, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Origin) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BytesPerWideShadow &gt; 4) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(BytesPerWideShadow == 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The wide shadow relates to two origin pointers: one for the first four</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// application bytes, and one for the latest four. We use a left shift to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// get just the shadow bytes that correspond to the first origin pointer,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and then the entire shadow for the second origin pointer (which will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chosen by combineOrigins() iff the least-significant half of the wide</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shadow was empty but the other half was not).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WideShadowLo = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><Highlight kind="normal">          WideShadow, ConstantInt::get(WideShadowTy, WideShadowBitWidth / 2));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><Highlight kind="normal">      Shadows.push&#95;back(WideShadow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><Highlight kind="normal">      Origins.push&#95;back(DFS.loadNextOrigin(Pos, OriginAlign, &amp;OriginAddr));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><Highlight kind="normal">      Shadows.push&#95;back(WideShadowLo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><Highlight kind="normal">      Origins.push&#95;back(Origin);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><Highlight kind="normal">      Shadows.push&#95;back(WideShadow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><Highlight kind="normal">      Origins.push&#95;back(Origin);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShouldTrackOrigins)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><Highlight kind="normal">    AppendWideShadowAndOrigin(CombinedWideShadow, FirstOrigin);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First OR all the WideShadows (i.e., 64bit or 32bit shadow chunks) linearly;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then OR individual shadows within the combined WideShadow by binary ORing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is fewer instructions than ORing shadows individually, since it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// needs logN shift/or instructions (N being the bytes of the combined wide</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// shadow).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t ByteOfs = BytesPerWideShadow; ByteOfs &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><Highlight kind="normal">       ByteOfs += BytesPerWideShadow) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><Highlight kind="normal">    ShadowAddr = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73e0482b96d9d0cdfcc90c0a34f5b0db">CreateGEP</a>(WideShadowTy, ShadowAddr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><Highlight kind="normal">                               ConstantInt::get(DFS.IntptrTy, 1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NextWideShadow =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><Highlight kind="normal">        IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a3313ae2d314fb689cebdaf062d86eec5">CreateAlignedLoad</a>(WideShadowTy, ShadowAddr, ShadowAlign);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><Highlight kind="normal">    CombinedWideShadow = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab61be8e3cf17e9848aeeeabacfa1b09a">CreateOr</a>(CombinedWideShadow, NextWideShadow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShouldTrackOrigins) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NextOrigin = DFS.loadNextOrigin(Pos, OriginAlign, &amp;OriginAddr);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><Highlight kind="normal">      AppendWideShadowAndOrigin(NextWideShadow, NextOrigin);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width = WideShadowBitWidth / 2; Width &gt;= DFS.ShadowWidthBits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><Highlight kind="normal">       Width &gt;&gt;= 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ShrShadow = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a5849d19e500f8c6713ec44889058f424">CreateLShr</a>(CombinedWideShadow, Width);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><Highlight kind="normal">    CombinedWideShadow = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab61be8e3cf17e9848aeeeabacfa1b09a">CreateOr</a>(CombinedWideShadow, ShrShadow);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab5b4acb0f45af3f2308cad1468804f1e">CreateTrunc</a>(CombinedWideShadow, DFS.PrimitiveShadowTy),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><Highlight kind="normal">          ShouldTrackOrigins</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><Highlight kind="normal">              ? <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-dataflowsanitizer-cpp-/dfsanfunction/#a92dd8bdf6470ea49d360683ec825dd4a">combineOrigins</a>(Shadows, Origins, Pos,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><Highlight kind="normal">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#a9ad53d2a00a6fb861b3a048c6592b742">ConstantInt::getSigned</a>(IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a64748b5a9f8d8dd4499f84312e2c1336">getInt64Ty</a>(), 0))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><Highlight kind="normal">              : DFS.ZeroOrigin&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;Value &#42;, Value &#42;&gt; DFSanFunction::loadShadowOriginSansLoadTracking(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Addr, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> InstAlignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> Pos) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ShouldTrackOrigins = DFS.shouldTrackOrigins();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Non-escaped loads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;AI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;AllocaInst&gt;</a>(Addr)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = AllocaShadowMap.find(AI);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> IRB(Pos-&gt;getParent(), Pos);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ShadowLI = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b01712e5f196d6d3d021ef23aad50e4">CreateLoad</a>(DFS.PrimitiveShadowTy, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OI = AllocaOriginMap.find(AI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!ShouldTrackOrigins || OI != AllocaOriginMap.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;ShadowLI, ShouldTrackOrigins</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><Highlight kind="normal">                            ? IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b01712e5f196d6d3d021ef23aad50e4">CreateLoad</a>(DFS.OriginTy, OI-&gt;second)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><Highlight kind="normal">                            : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2253"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const Value &#42;, 2&gt;</a> Objs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2254"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acc66c148bcd950ffcc3ab83989eb70bd">getUnderlyingObjects</a>(Addr, Objs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllConstants = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2256"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Obj : Objs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;Function&gt;</a>(Obj) || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;BlockAddress&gt;</a>(Obj))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2258"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(Obj) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;GlobalVariable&gt;</a>(Obj)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuinstructionselector-cpp/#a6dee2d9e1e2a288de903228075ac71de">isConstant</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2260"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2262"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllConstants = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2263"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2264"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2265"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AllConstants)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2266"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;DFS.ZeroPrimitiveShadow,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// make changes that require GlobalsAA to be invalidated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3486"><Highlight kind="normal">  PA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#ac8a842a601c470fa22db443ac34d0a67">abandon</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalsaa">GlobalsAA</a>&gt;();</Highlight></CodeLine>
